messages.subject: art name question
messages.msgSnippet: Torigoye Kazutaro wrote hakogaki signed with the art name Kodo meaning old road, ancient methods, ancient moral teachings, and so on.  He also used the art
messages.messageBody:
Torigoye Kazutaro wrote hakogaki signed with the art name Kodo meaning "old road, ancient methods, ancient moral teachings, and so on." He also used the art name Saro. I have been unable to identify the meaning of Saro or the kanji used to write it.

David Zincavage

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
